title: Introduction: Youth
lyrics:
[Intro: RM]
Hm-hm.. Yeah, ah
Youth has no age
It just stays there beautifully
And it's everyone who is chasing their dreams
Like Rap Mon, Jin, SUGA, j-hope, Jimin, V and Jungkook
We're one of them who is chasing our stars
So you can call us young, and we'll never get old
Fall (Everything)
Fall (Everything)
Fall (Everything)
Run, run, run 止まれはしないんだ (ないんだ, ないんだ)
Fall (Everything)
Fall (Everything)
Fall (Everything)
Run, run, run 止まれはしないんだ (ないんだ, ないんだ)
Oh, girl
ブルタオルネ
知らない 君は何も
Oh, girl
ブルタオルネ
崩れ出すこんなにも
Run
Don't tell me bye, bye
Run
You make me cry, cry
Run
Don't tell me bye, bye
Run
You make me cry, cry

I need you girl, I need you girl
全部灰にしな bow, wow-wow
ありのまま
走り出すのさ
I need you girl
I need you girl, I need you girl
全部灰にしな bow, wow-wow
言い訳は要らないもう
Everything, everything
ヒラヒラ舞う
花びらのシャワー
Fire
君しか愛せないどうせ
Everything, everything
ヒラヒラ舞う
花びらのシャワー
Fire
運命に嫌われても
Youth
